text: V.S. Vasan has been elected president of the Thanjavur Chamber of Commerce and Industry for 2016-18. The other office bearers elected include N.T. Balasundaram as vice-president, S.P.S. Aruldoss as secretary, C.T. Ramanathan as joint secretary and ST. Ramanathan as treasurer. An executive committee comprising 15 members were also elected.
title: TAMIL NADU
